code: import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{setRegistrationModalVisible,setLoginModalVisible}from'../features/modalSlice.js';import{logout,userIsAuthenticated}from'../features/userSlice.js';import DemoButton from'./DemoButton';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var NavBar=function NavBar(){var isAuthenticated=useSelector(userIsAuthenticated);var dispatch=useDispatch();var showRegistrationModal=function showRegistrationModal(){dispatch(setRegistrationModalVisible(true));};var showLoginModal=function showLoginModal(){dispatch(setLoginModalVisible(true));};var handleLogoutUser=function handleLogoutUser(){dispatch(logout());};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"navbar-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"registration-button",onClick:showRegistrationModal,children:"Register"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:!isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:showLoginModal,children:"Login"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"logout-button",onClick:handleLogoutUser,children:"Logout"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DemoButton,{})})]})});};export default NavBar;
